src:
Bogdan se raspucao, Kingsi ubacili 20 trojki, ali nisu izdržali u kući šampiona (VIDEO)
Bjelica skroman, Gudurić još traži svoje mesto

07 Nov 2019

Dogode se te utakmice kada vam šuterska forma dođe do perfekcije, ali jednostavno ne otvori vam se put do pobede. Košarkaši Sakramenta su protekle noći odigrali baš jedan takav meč. Mrežice su se zapalile od silnih pogodaka, Toronto je morao da izvuče više od maksimuma da bi ostao neporažen kod kuće i to se na kraju dogodilo! Reptorsi su zahvaljujući reinkarnaciji Kajla Laurija pregrmeli jedan od najtežih izazova kod kuće i u tesnoj završnici slavili rezultatom 124:120.
Da stvari budu jasnije, Toronto je nadigrao Sakramento od starta do finiša, ali su istrpeli neverovatan pritisak gostiju kroz šuteve za tri poena. Kingsi su ih ubacili čak 20! Iz 44 šuteva, doduše, što je odličnih 45,5 odsto realizacije, ali i pored toga morali su da pruže ruku boljem od sebe. Toronto nijednog trenutka nije bio u realnoj opasnosti da izgubi, ali je morao da se pomuči možda i više nego što se očekivalo, pogotovo kada je O Dži Anunobi promašio dva slobodna bacanja, a Paskal Sjakam prodao loptu u završnih 30 sekundi.



Prva figura Toronta definitivno je bio Kajl Lauri. Čovek godinama nije igrao ovako dobru košarku, a u svojoj 33. godini pokazuje da u njemu i dalje ima žara za velike utakmice. Postigao je 24 poena, napadao obruč bez straha i pogađao važne šuteve, što je Reptorsima nedostajalo prošle sezone uprkos šampionskom kraju. Važna je bila i rola Serža Ibake koji je ponovo sa klupe doneo jak impuls igri Toronta. Ubacio je 21 poen za 24 minuta i vrhunski rasteretio Marka Gasola koji je odigrao verovatno i najbolju partiju u dresu kanadskog kluba ove sezone. Bio je jako siguran iz svih pozicija, a u odbrani je postavljao zamke Sakramentovim bekovima zbog čega su Kingsi i bili dodatno motivisani da pucaju sa distance. Jeste Gasol ubacio samo 12 poena, ali njegov značaj ovom sastavu je bio nemerljiv. Standardno odličan je bio i Paskal Sjakam u obe faze igre, zbog čega je pribeležio 23 poena, 13 skokova, pet asistencija i dve ukradene lopte.
Kod Sakramenta glavnu reč je ovog puta vodio Bogdan Bogdanović. Najbolji srpski igrač na Mundobasketu u Kini konačno je pružio igru dostojnu njegovog imena i kvaliteta, pošto je uspeo da namesti nišan i pogađa u nizu. Ubacio je 22 poena (7/14 iz igre), ali uz čak šest trojki (6/11) za trideset jedan i po minut u igri. Upisao je još i tri asistencije i po dva skoka i ukradene lopte. Harison Barns je bio prvi strelac Kingsa sa 26 poena (7/15 iz igre), dok je Badi Hild dopisao 21 poen i osam skokova. Nemanja Bjelica je 16 minuta u igri imao tek pet poena (2/7 iz igre, 1/4 za tri), odnosno dva skoka i po jednu ukradenu i podeljenu loptu.



Memfis je prošle noći napravio veliko iznenađenje i seriju od tri poraza prekinuo trijumfom nad Minesotom - 137:121. 
Dilon Bruks je predvodio Grizlise sa 31 poenom, dok ga je ruki Dža Morant ispratio s 26 poena. Njihov saigrač Brendon Klark ubacio je svih sedam šuteva iz igre i prikupio 18 poena, dok je Džae Krauder imao takođe 18 poena. Srpski reprezentativac Marko Gudurić odigrao je 16 minuta i ubeležio sedam poena i po četiri skoka i asistencije. Ipak, američka javnost ističe da još traži svoje mesto pod suncem i da se nije dovoljno opustio na parketu zbog čega je samo sinoć propustio da šutne na koš u četiri otvorene situacije. Veruju da Gudurić može mnogo bolje, pogotovo jer mu je šut jedna od glavnih karakteristika u igri...
Kod Vukova Endrju Vigins je imao 30 poena, dok je Karl Entoni Tauns posle dve utakmice suspenzije skupio 25 poena i 13 skokova.

text:
Bogdan burst, Kings put 20 threes, but failed in champion's house (VIDEO)
Humble modest, Guduric is still looking for his place

07 Nov 2019

These games happen when the shooter form comes to perfection, but it just doesn't open the way to victory. Sacramento basketball played just one such match last night. The nets were on fire from huge hits, Toronto had to make more than the maximum to stay undefeated at home and that eventually happened! The reptors, thanks to the reincarnation of Kyle Lauri, overcame one of the toughest challenges at home and celebrated in a tight finish with a score of 124: 120.
To make things clearer, Toronto outplayed Sacramento from start to finish, but they have endured incredible guest pressure through three-point shots. The Kings have thrown in as many as 20! Of the 44 shots, admittedly, which is an excellent 45.5 percent realization, but still they had to lend a hand better than themselves. Toronto was in no real danger of losing, but it had to go a little harder than expected, especially as O J Anunobi missed two free throws and Pascal Syamam sold the ball in the final 30 seconds.



Toronto's first figure was definitely Kyle Lauri. The man has not played such good basketball for years, and at the age of 33 shows that he still has the urge to play big games. He scored 24 points, attacked the hoop fearlessly and hit important shots, something the Reptors lacked last season despite a championship finish. Also important was the roll of Serhi Ibaka, who once again brought a strong impetus to the Toronto game. He scored 21 points in 24 minutes and relieved Mark Gasol, who played arguably the best game in a Canadian club jersey this season. He was very safe from all positions, and in defense he set traps on Sacramento's backs which made the Kings even more motivated to shoot from distance. Gasol only scored 12 points, but his importance to this squad was immeasurable. As standard, Pascal Sycamam was excellent in both phases of the game, for which he tallied 23 points, 13 rebounds, five assists and two steals.
At Sacramento, Bogdan Bogdanovic was the keynote speaker this time. The best Serbian player at the Mundobasket in China has finally provided a game worthy of his name and quality, as he has been able to mount a niche and strike in a row. He scored 22 points (7/14 from the game), but with as many as six triples (6/11) in thirty-one and a half minutes in the game. He also tallied three assists and two rebounds and steals. Harrison Barnes was the Kings' first scorer with 26 points (7/15 from the game), while Buddy Hild posted 21 points and eight rebounds. Nemanja Bjelica had just five points (2/7 from the game, 1/4 for three) in 16 minutes, or two rebounds and one steal and split ball.



Memphis made a big surprise last night and ended a series of three defeats with a triumph over Minnesota - 137: 121.
Dillon Brooks led the Grizzlies with 31 points, while handy Jay Morant escorted him with 26 points. Their teammate Brendon Clark notched all seven shots from the game and collected 18 points, while Jae Krauder also had 18 points. Serbian national team player Marko Guduric played 16 minutes and recorded seven points and four rebounds and assists. Still, the American public points out that he is still seeking his place under the sun and that he has not relaxed enough on the parquet floor, which is why he only failed to hit the basket last night in four open situations. They believe Guduric can do much better, especially since his shot is one of the main features in the game ...
With the Wolves, Andrew Wiggins had 30 points, while Karl Anthony Towns collected 25 points and 13 rebounds after two games of suspension.
